item.title: 007 First Light Delayed To May 2026
item.content:encoded:
Three months before its March 27th, 2026 release, IO Interactive has delayed 007 First Light by two months. The James Bond game will now release on May 27th, 2026.

The upcoming action game from Hitman studio IO Interactive looks to be one of the biggest hits for next year. With an all-star cast, including singer Lenny Kravitz, there’s a lot riding on the developer’s ambitious project. Set at the beginning of Bond’s career, fans will see the young agent earn the 007 moniker on a world-trekking adventure fit for the novels. Its upcoming March 27th, 2026 release made it a huge blockbuster for the Spring season. Now, it’s been moved to the summer for polishing.

007 First Light ‘Playable’, But Delayed Two Months for Polish, Says IO Interactive

In a statement on the game’s official Twitter/X, it was announced that 007 First Light would be delayed two months. Now, instead of coming out on March 27th, 2026, it will now launch on May 27th, 2026. As to why the decision was made, the team brings up the need for refinement and polishing the final build. However, IO Interactive did share that the game is fully playable from start to finish, so the two months will help make it that much better.

The initial reaction to 007 First Light’s gameplay from its State of Play was a bit lackluster. Constant frame rate issues and iffy textures did sour the game’s reputation a bit. However, it seems the version fans have been waiting for will come to light thanks to the new delay. While it won’t be meeting it’s March deadline, it does position the game to be a great start to the Summer season.

What do you think of 007 First Light’s delay to May 2026? Do you think it needed the polish? Sad to see it miss its March 2026 deadline? Leave your thoughts in the comments below and on the official Insider Gaming Discord!

For more 007 First Light, check out the coverage on the potential theme song singer, as well as Insider Gaming’s preview. Don’t forget to subscribe to our weekly newsletter!

item.title: Dungeon Hunters Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Dungeon Hunters monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Gems and much more. 

Unlocking new worlds and clearing every chapter in Dungeon Hunters takes a lot of grinding. As you progress, newly unlocked Worlds become tougher, forcing you to level up, deal more damage, equip better armor, and unlock stronger gear. To speed things up, you can redeem the active Dungeon Hunters codes to earn free Gems. Gems are instrumental since they’re used to summon weapon cases, giving you access to stronger weapons early on. With the right weapons from free Gems, you can clear even the toughest dungeons without spending hours in this thrilling Roblox experience.

Active Dungeon Hunters Codes

  • DC_1000 – 100 Gems (New)
  • DC_500 – 100 Gems
  • DC_100 – 100 Gems
  • 12K_LiKes – 100 Gems
  • 5K_lIKes – 100 Gems
  • 1K_LiKes – 100 Gems
  • 100liKES – 100 Gems
  • 100liKES – 100 Gems
  • DC_join – 100 Gems
  • NEW – 100 Gems

Inactive Dungeon Hunters Codes

There are no inactive codes for Dungeon Hunters. Whenever an active code expires, it’ll be added here. Double-check the codes before redeeming, as the promo codes are case-sensitive. 

How To Redeem Dungeon Hunters Codes

Follow these steps to activate all the codes in Dungeon Hunters: 

  1. Launch the game and connect to the lobby.
  2. Press the settings icon at the top right corner of the screen. 
  3. Enter any code into the “Enter code…” text box. 
  4. Click the “OK” button to redeem the code. 

More About Dungeon Hunters

You have a slight chance of summoning weapons with one of these three Elements: Fire Element, Poison Element, and Thunder Element. You can summon 1 case for 100 Gems, 10 for 1000 Gems. Fill the Epic Pity, Legendary Pity, and Mythical Pity bars by constantly summoning weapons. This will increase your chances of getting the rarest weapons. Here are all the weapons with their summon chance percentages: 

Weapon Case Summon #1:

  • Death Scythe – 0.4%
  • Guitar – 1.4%
  • Mantis Blades – 11.2%
  • Duel Berettas – 37%
  • Hammer – 50% 

Weapon Case Summon #2:

  • Floating Cannon – 0.4% 
  • Electric Saw – 1.4%
  • Magic Book – 11.2%
  • Shield – 37%
  • Katana – 50%

Weapon Case Summon #3:

  • Scarlet Edge – 0.4%
  • Golden Guard – 1.4%
  • Violet Duals – 11.2%
  • Bass – 37%
  • Saw – 50%

FAQs on Dungeon Hunters

What are the latest active codes in Dungeon Hunters? 

“DC_1000” is the latest active code. 

What code offers the most Gems upon redemption? 

Currently, all the active codes can be redeemed for 100 Gems each in Dungeon Hunters. 

Can you claim Traits and weapons from the active codes?

Currently, none of the active codes offer free Traits and weapons.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.
